## TextAreaBuilderOptions.cursorMode property

Cursor display mode.

**Signature:**

```typescript
cursorMode?: CursorMode;
```

## Remarks

Controls how the cursor is displayed: - `CursorMode.Blink`<!-- -->: Cursor blinks on and off (default) - `CursorMode.Static`<!-- -->: Cursor is always visible - `CursorMode.Hidden`<!-- -->: Cursor is not displayed
